section.11: The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj)

hadiths.text: Narrated Najiyah al-Aslami: The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) sent sacrificial camels with him (as offering to the Ka'bah). He then said: If any one of them becomes fatigued, slaughter it, dip its shoes in its blood, and leave it for the people (to eat)
